title: Daniel Jones vs. Mac Jones, Best Fantasy RBs, Biggest News Ahead of Week 1, More Young QB Battles
itunes:title: Daniel Jones vs. Mac Jones, Best Fantasy RBs, Biggest News Ahead of Week 1, More Young QB Battles
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, DeAngelo Hall, Peter Schrager and Kyle Brandt break down the best highlights from Week 3 of the NFL preseason ahead of the regular season openers. The crew discusses how young quarterbacks fighting for the starting spot fared in Week 1, including New York Giants quarterback Daniel Jones, New England Patriots quarterback Mac Jones, Trevor Lawrence of the Jacksonville Jaguars and the San Francisco 49ers quarterback competition between Jimmy Garoppolo and Trey Lance. The hosts tackle a range of topics including the best running backs to draft in fantasy football this season and the biggest headlines and news across the league.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
